snippet: On Friday, President Obama dined for the second time with four contest winners, and for the second time all four were from states that the Obama campaign considers battlegrounds.
abstract: On Friday, President Obama dined for the second time with four contest winners, and for the second time all four were from states that the Obama campaign considers battlegrounds.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- President Obama dined for the second time with four winners of the quarterly "Dinner With Barack" contest, and for the second time, all four winners were from states that the Obama campaign considers battlegrounds that could help determine whether Mr. Obama is re-elected.

headline.main: Obama Has Lunch With Contest Winners - From Swing States
